column4: My computer randomly froze and I was forced to shut it down by cutting the power. When I tried to reboot it, it froze at grub and gave me error 16. I restarted it again and I got error 25. Can someone help?
try using the supergrub disk.. it should restore grub to the mbr
GIYF http://www.google.ca/search?hl=en&q=supergrub+disk&btnG=Search&meta=&aq=f&oq= click on the first link
